item.title: Side by side LLMs with Ollama and Streamlit
item.description: The recent 0.1.33 release of Ollama added experimental support for running multiple LLMs or the same LLM in parallel. But, to compare models on the same prompt we need a UI and that’s what we’re going to build in this blog post. I’ve created a video showing how to do this on my YouTube channel, Learn Data with Mark, so if you prefer to consume content through that medium, I’ve embedded it below:
